snippet: Jonathan Hill was pressed to explain why someone from outside the eurozone should write the rules governing financial markets and the banking sector across Europe.
lead_paragraph: Jonathan Hill was pressed to explain why someone from outside the eurozone should write the rules governing financial markets and the banking sector across Europe.

headline.main: British Nominee to Oversee E.U. Financial Markets Faces Skeptics in Brussels
headline.print_headline: British Nominee to Oversee E.U. Financial Markets Faces Skeptics in Brussels
